title: How to Draw Woodstock from Peanuts

steps.title: Draw an oval for his head.
steps.content: Draw an oval for his head. It should look like a thin, sideways egg. Add guidelines if you like, but they're not really necessary for a drawing this simple.

steps.title: Draw his eyes and hair.
steps.content: Draw his eyes and hair. The hair is just a couple of squiggles around his face (don't worry about realism since he's a cartoon character) and remember, the eye is more of a dash than a dot!

steps.title: Draw a neck connected to a circle for his body.
steps.content: Draw a neck connected to a circle for his body. Add in his small wings and a tail almost like a sharp tooth jutting out.

steps.title: Add small rectangles for the legs.
steps.content: Add small rectangles for the legs. Attach long, thin ovals to them to serve as the feet.

steps.title: Color and outline your drawing.
steps.content: Color and outline your drawing. Make sure no excess guidelines remain. Woodstock is a brilliant sunshiny color, so use the brightest shade of yellow you have!
